item.title: Dissolve the Empty See (MTC)
item.description: The Holy See is in Rome. The Empty See is in St. Louis. The Metropolitan Taxicab Commission (MTC) is a racket to protect incumbent taxicab companies. They use their power to keep St. Louis in the stone age of transportation. It’s time to dissolve the MTC. It has served its purpose and outlived its usefulness. Like the riverboat commission of the 1850s. Until then, I will do everything in my power to avoid taxis in St.
